enterprise_cloud_database_service_mainte: The planned maintenance operations will be carried out at the default maintenance window, which is on {{ dayOfWeek }} at {{ time }} (UTC Time) for {{ duration }}. You may adjust the window, if you would like the maintenance to be carried out at a time of your choice. Please note that some maintenance operation can take longer than desired maintenance window.
The routine maintenance would be carried out on {{ dayOfWeek }} at {{ time }} (UTC Time) for {{ duration }}.
The longer the maintenance duration, the higher is the maintenance jobs performed. The recommended duration is 2 hours.
